long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube Thumbnail Hider - Focus on Content, Not Clickbait
The YouTube Thumbnail Hider extension is designed to provide a cleaner, distraction-free YouTube experience by hiding video thumbnails. Whether you're tired of clickbait images, want to avoid spoilers, or simply prefer a more minimalistic browsing experience, this extension allows you to focus on video titles and descriptions without the influence of thumbnails.

Key Features:
Hide Thumbnails: Automatically hides video thumbnails across YouTube, including the home page, search results, and video recommendations.
Blur Thumbnails: Optionally blur the thumbnails instead of hiding them completely for a less harsh visual change.
On-Hover Reveal: Reveal thumbnails only when you hover over them for a more interactive experience.
Solid Color Thumbnails: Replace thumbnails with a solid background color for a clean, minimalist look.
Customizable Behavior: Choose to hide or show thumbnails on specific YouTube sections such as the homepage, watch page, search results, playlists, and more.
Temporary Disable: Easily toggle thumbnail hiding on and off with a click whenever you want to view thumbnails again.
Why Use YouTube Thumbnail Hider?
Avoid Distractions: Remove visual clutter that can cause procrastination, helping you stay focused while browsing.
Block Spoilers: Ideal for avoiding spoilers in thumbnails for movies, games, or any series.
Teaching & Professional Use: Perfect for teachers and professionals who need to show videos without inappropriate or distracting thumbnails to students or audiences.
Say goodbye to distracting and clickbaity images, and enjoy a more peaceful, content-focused YouTube experience with YouTube Thumbnail Hider.
